mapper.update:
update tcz_member
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
commission = #{commission,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
birth = #{birth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_locked = #{isLocked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
locked_date = #{lockedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_failure_count = #{loginFailureCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_photo = #{userPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fixed_phone = #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point = #{point,jdbcType=BIGINT},
register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
member_rank_id = #{memberRankId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tcz_member set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, commission = #{commission,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_locked = #{isLocked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, locked_date = #{lockedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_failure_count = #{loginFailureCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_photo = #{userPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fixed_phone = #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, point = #{point,jdbcType=BIGINT}, register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, member_rank_id = #{memberRankId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT i.image as image,i.name as name,i.status as status, enter.enterCount FROM tcz_member m LEFT JOIN tcz_order o ON m.id = o.member_id LEFT JOIN tcz_order_detail od ON o.id = od.order_id LEFT JOIN tcz_item i ON od.item_id = i.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oo.item_id, count(oo.item_id) AS enterCount FROM tcz_order_detail oo GROUP BY oo.item_id ) enter ON i.id = enter.item_id WHERE m.is_deleted = 0 AND o.delete_flag = 0 AND m.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
